column2: Italy's  TG  licensing system  is  decentralized, managed  at  the  regional
level  to  accommodate its diverse cultural heritage and administrative
structure.  Prospective  guides  must  successfully  pass  a  qualifying
examination administered by the region where they plan to work. These
